extendedInfo.description: Calorie Manager helps you lose weight and reach your target weight loss by managing your daily calories allowed to reach your goal.After setting up your physical information, setting your weight loss training goals, and entering your calorie counts each day, the Calorie Manager app will let you know what your current calorie count is for the current day and how many more calories you are allowed in order to reach your weight loss goal date.  With the Calorie Manager app, you'll be able to know if you need to burn some extra calories at the end of the day or if you've been good enough to have that extra dessert at the end of the day.  By utilizing this simple yet effective weight loss app, you will be able to manage your daily calorie intake so you can lose weight by your goal date.
